DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect Sativex electrocardiogram ( ECG ) trace administer therapeutic dose 8 spray per day multiple therapeutic dose ( 24 36 spray per day ) , evaluate safety tolerability .
DOC.detailed_description: This multiple-dose , randomize , double-blind , double-dummy , placebo- active-controlled , four arm , parallel group study evaluate effect Sativex QT/QTc interval . Within 30 day screen , eligible subject randomize one four treatment group . Baseline ECG measurement record specify time follow day , subject commence five day treatment Sativex placebo . On Day 5 , subject receive either moxifloxacin 400 mg ( Group 4 ) moxifloxacin placebo ( Groups 1 , 2 3 ) . Triplicate ECG measurement pharmacokinetic sample collect Day 5 . On day 1-5 , Safety ECG measurement also collect pre-dose 2 hour post-dose . Subjects return study centre outpatient safety follow-up visit approximately 10-14 day last dose study medication .

Any rhythm sinus rhythm , interpret investigator clinically significant . History torsade de pointes risk factor torsade de pointes ( e.g . heart failure , hypokalemia , family history Long QT syndrome ) . Postural drop 20 mmHg systolic blood pressure screen .
